name: tugende-project
description: A simple To-Do app developing and using a new frontend framework of the same name - Work in Progress!! It follows the Build a Frontend Web Framework (From Scratch) by Angel Sola Orbaiceta, published 2024 by Manning (https://www.manning.com/books/build-a-frontend-web-framework-from-scratch)
author: Jan Holbo Rasmussen <jan@kaddu.dk> (https://j-cave.dk/)
